name: Ben 10 Alien Force: The Rise of Hex
name_original: Ben 10 Alien Force: The Rise of Hex
description:
Ben 10 Alien Force: The Rise of Hex is an arcade game developed by Black Lantern Studios. It came out on 26-05-2010. It was published by Konami.
You can play Ben 10 Alien Force: The Rise of Hex on Wii and Xbox 360.
